nodes.text: Kintan striders were a species of silicon-based lifeforms from the planet Kintan whose appearance was used for one of the holographic pieces in the game dejarik. Kintan Striders were intelligent enough to use simple tools. Tasu Leech, leader of the criminal Kanjiklub gang, owned a Donderbus blaster whose handle was made from the ulna of a Kintan strider.
